messages.content: ComfyUI_UltimateSDUpscale is a set of ComfyUI nodes for the Ultimate Stable Diffusion Upscale script by Coyote-A, which is a wrapper for the script used in the A1111 extension.
To install ComfyUI_UltimateSDUpscale, enter the command 'git clone https://github.com/ssitu/ComfyUI_UltimateSDUpscale --recursive' from the commandline starting in ComfyUI/custom_nodes/.
How do I use the Ultimate SD Upscale node?
Ultimate SD Upscale nodes can be found in the node menu under 'image/upscaling'. Choose the appropriate version based on whether or not the input image is already upscaled.
What parameters can be set in the Ultimate SD Upscale node?

Details about most of the parameters can be found [here](https://github.com/Coyote-A/ultimate-upscale-for-automatic1111/wiki/FAQ#parameters-descriptions). Unique parameters include `upscale_by` and `force_uniform_tiles`.
What is the difference between the Ultimate SD Upscale and Ultimate SD Upscale (No Upscale) nodes?

The Ultimate SD Upscale node includes upscale inputs, while the 'No Upscale' version assumes the input image is already upscaled. The 'No Upscale' version is useful when you have an upscaled image or if you want to do the tiled sampling without upscaling.
